title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.11 - Reply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.11 - Reply

State Regulations

If the appellant elects to reply to the answer of the
respondent, such reply shall be served and filed not later than five days after
the date of service of the answer. If the answer was served by mail, the date
of the mailing and the two days subsequent thereto shall be excluded in
computing the five-day period. The appellant may attach to his reply such
supporting affidavits, memoranda or other papers as he considers pertinent to
his reply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
